summary: BRICS and Africa: Partnership for Mutually Accelerated Growth, Sustainable Development and Inclusive Multilateralism - South Africa to host the Sixth BRICS Sherpas Meeting. The Chair’s Summary of the Extraordinary Joint Meeting of BRICS Leaders and Leaders of the invited BRICS Members on the situation in the Middle East with particular reference to Gaza. South Africa to chair BRICS Extraordinary Joint Meeting on the Middle East situation in Gaza.
